report.title: Ketamine Log
report.author: Murple
report.bodytext: 11:45PM /n ------- /n I weigh out 50mg of Ketamine HCl which was obtained pure (not as /n an injectible solution) from a chemical supplier. It is a crystalline /n powder with some rather large chunks that look like crystals of table /n salt. I crush this to a fine powder, then further powder it with a razor /n blade, and divide it into two even lines. This is about my 8th experience /n with ketamine, though I've never written a report about it before. Looking /n at this 50mg, it appears to be alot more than what I've done before. /n Erowid's ketamine dosage page states 'One method for nasal use is to /n insufflate (snort) 25 mg in each nostril, wait 5 minutes and repeat until /n you reach your desired dosage.' I do not anticipate that there will be any /n need to repeat. Looking at this, I visually estimate that most of my prior /n experiences have been with around 30-40mg. /n /n 12:00AM /n ------- /n I insufflate the first 25mg. There is a mild burn, but not too /n bad. The file mentions doing 50mg at once. I've decided to space it /n out somewhat and see how things work out. /n /n 12:03AM /n ------- /n I feel very noticable effects. My body begins to feel strange. My /n head has a sort of 'balloon-like' feel to it, its somewhat like nitrous /n oxide without the sound in the head. Speaking of sounds... I put on /n Orbital's live mix of 'Halcyon On & On'. Normally this song is very /n pretty... but now, even with headphones, it sounds muffled or distant. /n Ketamine certainly doesn't seem to enhance music - quite the opposite. /n /n 12:11AM /n ------- /n I am getting strange visual disturbances. Hard to explain really. /n I have the impression that things are moving, but nothing looks as though /n its moving. Corner-of-the-eye type stuff... but much more so. There is /n a flittiness to the visual effects that is vaguely reminiscent (I was /n completely unable to spell this word myself and had to ask for help on the /n Internet) of the visual effects produced by ecstasy. My visual field is /n swimming... thats the best word for it, somehow. As if looking at /n everything through some kind of moving liquid. /n /n 12:18AM /n ------- /n There is a noticable drop in intensity of the effects. Visual /n effects are still present. I still have a feeling of 'dumbness' (not being /n able to remember words, etc). In fact I am nowhere near baseline. But the /n initial rush is over. My body feels 'weird.' There are no closed eye /n visuals. /n /n 12:30AM /n ------- /n I still feel a little unusual, and my visual field is still /n swimming a little, but the effects are more or less over. 25mg remains /n sitting on my plate. I'm not sure I want to do it... I feel as if I wasted /n the first 25mg by sitting in front of a computer and trying to describe it /n in realtime - as if the very act of attempting to describe the effects /n prevents the more interesting effects form appearing. /n /n 12:40AM /n ------- /n I divided the remaining 25mg into 2 more lines, and put some Orb /n on through headphones. I insufflate one of the 2 lines, then go to lay /n down and close my eyes and listen to music. /n /n 12:45AM /n ------- /n No significant increase in effects from that mg, so I insufflate /n the other. I go back to laying down, after skipping to a different Orb /n tune (Little Fluffy Clouds, Dance Mix MK2). /n /n 12:56AM /n ------- /n The song ends. I get up to start writing. My body feels somewhat /n 'detatched' - I can't quite explain it. Its not numbness per se, but /n shares some qualities. Laying on my bed was very odd. The bed felt hard, /n and the pillows felt hard, as if laying my head back on a cloth-covered /n rock. The overhead light in my bedroom appears somewhat like the light /n over an operating table. Not much in the way of closed eye visuals. Open /n eyed, my room looks somewhat stark and my perspective seems odd. Is my /n heart beating OK, am I breathing normal? I think. Don't really care. I /n find myself thinking of mundane, every day issues, trying to find answers /n to things which have been on my mind - no answers come to me that haven't /n already come to me sober. I seem to be able to think about things in a /n detatched, analytical way, but there is no enlightenment coming that I can /n see. Most drug 'spirits' I've dealt with have seemed to be male or female /n - not so ketamine. The ketamine 'spirit' seems robotic or mechanical in /n nature. This molecule taps into some very different energies than the /n traditional psychedelics. I would not consider this a psychedelic at all. /n Its something else entirely. /n /n 1:08AM /n ------ /n I feel I'm in approximately the same place as I was at the 12:18AM /n entry above. Visual field is swimming. Feel physically weird...a slight /n sensation of motion, perhaps. Somewhat dulled sensation. Music sounds /n mostly normal. But the mental effects have noticably dropped off. I feel /n more 'coherent' and though quite a ways above baseline, I'm definately /n aware that I'm headed there. /n /n 1:20AM /n ------ /n Visual effects are still quite noticable, though dramatically /n less than what they were. Other effects are decreasing rapidly. I decide /n to smoke some cannabis and conclude this experiment. /n /n 1:34AM /n ------ /n I am on IRC... I just had a very intense deja vu experience. I /n recieved 2 variations on the same chain email from 2 friends who are /n totall unconnected (except through me). Then all of the sudden I realized /n that the conversation I was having on IRC was something I had before. I /n had the strange feeling that I existed in that time segment twice. Just /n thought it was worth mentioning... Strange!
